articles.title: Massive Fire Erupts On Goods Train Carrying Diesel In Tamil Nadu
articles.description: A major fire broke out on four wagons of a goods train carrying diesel near the Tiruvallur railway station around 5:30 am, triggering panic in the surrounding areas.

articles.title: Elon Musk Asks Trump to Release Epstein Files
articles.description: Billionaire Elon Musk urged former ally and US President Donald Trump to release case files related to sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, as previously promised.

articles.title: Iran's President Injured in Alleged Israeli Assassination Plot
articles.description: Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian was lightly injured in an Israeli airstrike on June 16, according to Iranian Revolutionary Guard Corps-affiliated Fars News Agency.
